internships.title: Software Development Intern
internships.description: Assist in developing web applications using modern frameworks. Collaborate with a team of developers to deliver high-quality software solutions.
internships.requirements: Knowledge of JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Strong problem-solving skills.

internships.title: Marketing Intern
internships.description: Support the marketing team in executing campaigns. Conduct market research and analyze data to identify trends.
internships.requirements: Excellent communication skills. Familiarity with social media platforms and digital marketing tools.

internships.title: Graphic Design Intern
internships.description: Create visual content for various digital platforms. Work closely with the design team to develop creative concepts.
internships.requirements: Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite. Strong portfolio showcasing design skills.

internships.title: Data Analyst Intern
internships.description: Analyze large datasets to uncover insights. Assist in building data models and generating reports.
internships.requirements: Experience with SQL and data visualization tools. Strong analytical and quantitative skills.

internships.title: HR Intern
internships.description: Support the HR team with recruitment and onboarding processes. Maintain employee records and assist with HR projects.
internships.requirements: Strong organizational skills. Knowledge of HR practices and procedures.
